intro.title: Hello!
intro.text:
My name is Simone Timi, I'm a full stack web developer and former speech pathologist with a passion for tech and linguistics.
 Let's swap out the articulation cards for some fresh lines of code!

about.title: About me
about.text:
I'm a former speech-language pathologist diving headfirst into the world of web development! Why?
 I've always had a knack for solving puzzles and finding creative solutions. That's what initially drew me to web development, and it didn't disappoint me. There's a unique thrill in seeing a project come to life, no matter if the code works immediately or I have to spend hours debugging.
 My aim is to craft apps that are both highly functional and genuinely enjoyable to use, with a focus on accessibility.
 While my background may be a bit unconventional, my ability to think creatively and focus on the end-user remains strong. If you're searching for a developer with a fresh perspective and dedication to quality, let's connect!

projectOne.title: Blog App
projectOne.text: Full stack project with secure authentication and MongoDB integration. Written entirely in TypeScript with Next.js.

projectTwo.title: Message Board
projectTwo.text: App for posting and reading messages, with secure authentication. Backend developed with Express.

projectThree.title: Weather App
projectThree.text: Minimalistic weather app with 7-days forecast. Originally written in JavaScript and re-written in Typescript.

projectFour.title: Token Bag App
projectFour.text: Simple companion app for the RPG-game Koriko. It offers the ability to save the user's session on local storage. Written in React and Next.js.

projectFive.title: Pokémon Memory Game
projectFive.text: Memory game where the player must never click on the same Pokémon twice. Written in React.

projectSix.title: Portfolio
projectSix.text: This very portfolio is written in TypeScript/React with Next.js.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: Seeking exciting collaborations and opportunities! If you have a project where my skills could be an asset, let's connect. You can reach me at:
